title: Did Grandma and AK-47 rescue the police attack by a street gang?
subtitle: An incident in which a 79-year-old grandmother armed with an AK-47 aircraft saved the lives of two LAPD officers was attacked by gang members was reported.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The 79-year-old Wendy Robinson from Los Angeles came to rescue two LAPD officers with her AK-47 assault rifle when gang members attacked them.
